newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Empire East to issue 3.0 bln-peso debt.
newsitem.headline: Empire East to issue 3.0 bln-peso debt.

text.p: The board of Empire East Land Holdings Inc has approved the issue of 3.0 billion pesos worth of commercial paper, a Philippine Stock Exchange advisory said on Monday.

The issue will comprise 2.0 billion pesos of long-term paper and 1.0 billion pesos of short-term. Long-term paper in the Philippines has a one to seven-year maturity while short-term paper has one year.
Proceeds from the long-term paper will be used to fund the company's land acquisition and development activities, while the short-term paper will serve as working capital, the statement said.
Empire East is the housing arm of Megaworld Properties & Holdings Inc.
No further details were immediately available.
